mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectComChrger Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ COM_ID , CHRGER_JOB_CD , CHRGER_TURN , BRND_ID , CHRGER_NM , CHRGER_CLSF , CHRGER_EMAIL , CHRGER_TEL_NATION_NO , CHRGER_TEL_AREA_NO , CHRGER_TEL_TLOF_NO , CHRGER_TEL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , CHRGER_MOBIL_NATION_NO , CHRGER_MOBIL_AREA_NO , CHRGER_MOBIL_TLOF_NO , CHRGER_MOBIL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM COM_CHRGER WHERE 1 = 1 AND COM_ID = #{comId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CHRGER_JOB_CD = #{chrgerJobCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CHRGER_TURN = #{chrgerTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
